leaving a tail for weaving in pull tail through last loop to fasten_off bring left and right side of finished piece together with right sides facing you use the tail from the co edge to join the 2 edges together at the bottom with a mattress stitch seam see notes below stopping once you reach the double garter ridge at the base of the thumb weave the tail through the stitches along the thumb section until you reach the single garter ridge at the top of the thumb then continue sewing as before with a mattress seam until you reach the bobble edge weave in both ends notes on mattress stitch the mattress stitch will create a nearly invisible join lining up the v of knit stitches side-by-side on the right side with a selvedge of 1 stitch created on the wrong side you will stitch using the bars between the 1st and 2nd stitches on either side of the seam ↓ ↓ v_v_v_v_v v_v_v_v_v v_v_v_v_v v_v_v_v_v ↑ ↑ pull the yarn tight to bring the two sides of the work together but pull/stretch the
